titleStmt.title: An order of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, assembled at Westminster, in the House of Lords, December 22. 1688.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Awnsham and William Churchill,

notesStmt.note: Orders all papists to leave the city of London.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
